entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Expose Id on System.Diagnostics.ActivityContext #97899
    Future
  • Enable .NET 9 developers to build more intelligent apps #97896
    9.0.0
  • Position information lost when calling `JsonSerializer.Deserialize` overloads accepting `Utf8JsonReader`. #97893
    Future
  • [jitstress] Assertion failed '!"Inconsistent profile data"' #97892
    9.0.0
  • ValidateEnumeratedItemsAttribute does not validate Dictionaries #97873
    Future
  • API for side-channel free decryption of RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 ciphertexts #97866
    Future
  • Remove RequiresUnreferencedCode from DefaultValueAttribute #97842
  • Remove trim warnings from ComponentModel APIs that take Type as a parameter #97841

Closed

  • ILogger throws System.FormatException in .net8 but the same code works in .net7 #97852
    Future
  • UdpClient don't receive packets (Mac OS) #97718
  • [Jit] Redundant comparisons are not eliminated #35348
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Reflection.Attributes #91620
    9.0.0
  • Null or empty array configuration does not update corresponding bound model property #97857
  • JIT: Extraneous jumps around alignment in some cases after `BBJ_NONE` removal #96998
    9.0.0
  • The `m_CallConv` of `System.String::Ctor` is inconsistent with `System.String::.ctor` #97499
    Future
  • SemaphoreSlim.Dispose does not work #97851
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Assert failure in PutThumb2BlRel24 #97750
    Future
  • JsonSerializer: Allow out-of-order reading of metadata properties. #72604
    9.0.0
  • NAOT: isinst with multiple guesses without fallback #97602
    Future
  • Remove designer related attributes from ComponentModel when trimming applications #97840
  • [wasm] WBT tests using `BrowserRunner` seem to hang on a subsequent `dotnet new` #97054
  • .NET runtime's method of loading Assemblies breaks Win32 LoadLibrary behavior #90839
  • Update of libunwind to 1.8.0 has broken remote unwind #97343
    9.0.0
  • `[LibraryImport]` throws `NotImplementedException` on `ref readonly` parameters #97706
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Make Enumerable.First/Last/GetElement faster on various enumerables #97905
    area-System.Linq
  • IL test entry points should be in types so test discovery can occur. #97904
    test-bug, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Initialize R12 pointer from context in StackFrameIterator #97903
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Alternative fix for ARM64 signed small type cmpxchg without LSE #97902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Try to fold basic arithmetic operations as part of import #97901
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_EG_3A, IF_SVE_EY_3A, IF_SVE_EZ_3A #97900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: Set edge likelihoods during patchpoint transformation #97897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move ManagedHost project for host tests to pre-built test asset #97894
    test-enhancement, area-Host, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Stop trying to format HOST_RUNTIME_CONTRACT property with locale settings #97891
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 8.0.x
  • Fix regex lazy loop handling of backtracking state at max iteration limit #97890
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Unify formatting part of BigInteger of CoreLib #97889
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add ARM64 encoding for group IF_SVE_CK_2A #97887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add Arm64 encoding for groups IF_SVE_CV_3A and IF_SVE_CV_3B #97886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add encoding for ARM64 IF_SVE_CJ_2A instruction group #97885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/6.0-staging] Update SqlClient and ship Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #97884
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-staging] Update SqlClient and ship Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #97883
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update SystemDataSqlClientVersion from 4.8.5 -> 4.8.6 #97882
    area-System.Data
  • Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #97881
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add support for Vector<T>.Indices and Vector.CreateSequence #97880
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Force sourceUrl with a suffix .cdp #97879
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove synchronization from Http2Connection.ExtendWindow #97878
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V] Skip ComputeReturnFlags in ArgIteratorTemplate::HasRetBuffArg #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Cosh/Sinh/Tanh for double #97874
    area-System.Numerics
  • [MT][browser] Fix running in-tree sample apps #97872
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Fixes exception while debugging on Chrome as IDE #97871
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser][ws] fix ConnectAsync_CancellationRequestedInflightConnect_ThrowsOperationCanceledException #97868
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] TypeNameParser #97864
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][llvm] Remove an llvm restriction which is not needed anymore. #97862
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono][aot] Allow valuetype sharing for more sizes. #97860
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [HTTP] Regenerated ref #97858
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NativeAOT][8.0] Use ld_classic in ILC build and in build integration #97856
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move `DevirtualizationManager` to `NodeFactory` #97855
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix reflection-getting function pointer fields #97854
    area-System.Reflection
  • Standardize on using code location for interior asm code references #97853
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][jit] Fix passing of byref arguments in m… #97850
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.x
  • Avoid allocating HashSet in Distinct() for some counts #97845
    area-System.Linq
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove use of `NewHolder<>` as field. #97843
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Enable TensorPrimitives.Sigmoid vectorization for double #97846
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: remove fallthrough limitations from redundant branch optimizer #97722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set DisableArcadeExcludeFromBuildSupport & support DotNetBuildTests flag #97762
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Devirtualize more methods deemed final by whole program view #97867
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Return all error messages instead of throwing on the first error in linker tests #97605
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_DW_2A, IF_SVE_DW_2B, IF_SVE_EB_1B #97800
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Update ILLink.CodeFixProvider.csproj #97796
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Move SB metadata to intermediates #97888
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Allow jump-to-next-block removal for blocks with alignment #97011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable IL stripping in System.Runtime.Tests for Apple mobile #97870
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add ARM encoding group IF_SVE_CI_3A #97808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Enable native AOT for non-portable crossgen2 #97536
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix referencing System.Linq in configuration source gen #97844
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [workloads] Update net8 mobile workload definitions #97824
    area-Build-mono
  • [debugger][mt] Unify multithreading switches #97861
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Fix unwinding over floating point registers #97863
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update HasThis check for String constructors in interpreter. (#97499) #97849
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Bail out on IMAGE_REL_BASED_THUMB_BRANCH24 with >24-bit addends #97756
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JsonSerializer] Add support for out-of-order metadata reads. #97474
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Late cast expansion: multiple candidates #97773
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[wasm][debugger] Do not send to IDE the eval scripts" #97876
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Use Expm1 in TensorPrimitives.Tanh #97859
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Source built short stack support #97725
    source-build, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Unblock WBT that are not hanging anymore #97764
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Prevent misoptimization by clang #97811
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] ELF ARM: Produce different relocation type for B and BL #97823
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove use of `NewHolder<>` as field. #97837
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix isKnonwNonNull for box and unbox #97799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for ref-readonly in the .NET interop source generators #97720
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Patch libunwind to hotfix validation pipe creation race #97817
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • STJ: Avoid duplicate initialization of required or init-only properties #97726
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Mark most specific static DIM for types marked RelevantToVariantCasting #97487
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Implement faster RSA key check #97827
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance
  • Create directory for Binding Tools For Swift #97208
    area-Meta
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IF_4A` to `SVE_JK_4B` #97739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Generalize `optSetPreheaderWeight` #96843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ARM64 signed small type cmpxchg for 8.0 atomics #97839
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] dispatch across threads via emscripten #97669
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Handle open types to appear in interface maps #97733
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Force sourceUrl with a suffix .cdp #97702
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 8.0.3
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser] Use standard xunit test runner on multithreaded runtime #91317
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse(powerOfTen) #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fix consistency issue in GetKeyedServices with AnyKey #97561
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add Sve.IsSupported support #97814
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixes exception while debugging on Chrome as IDE #97838
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96254
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Unified intrinsics emission front-end experiments #91993
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [RISC-V] Implement replacing safe-point call instructions under GC_STRESS #97818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Make RandomAccess.Read*|Write* methods work with non-seekable files #96711
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Add sudo to dmesg call in test run template #97624
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Rework the special instantiation type logic to be more effective #95490
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
